DOC.brief_title: Effects Duloxetine Pathological Worry Patients With Generalized Anxiety Disorder : A fMRI Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study recruit 20 GAD patient 20 healthy control . Both patient control receive medical psychiatric screen procedure visit 1 ask complete three self-rating questionnaire one health questionnaire visit 1 . All qualified participant receive functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) baseline . The patient begin treatment duloxetine 30 mg/day visit 2 titrate 60 mg/day visit 3 ( 2 week since drug dispense ) . The dosage maintain 60 mg/day 6 week . During period , patient receive periodic evaluation visit 2 ( 0 week drug dispense ) , 3 ( 2 week since drug dispense ) , 4 ( 4 week since drug dispense ) , 5 ( 8 week since drug dispense ) . The patient receive fMRI examination baseline end 8-week treatment .
